name: KungfuCowboy
description:
Kungfu Cowboy is an action roguelike shooting platformer. Play as ‘A-Pa,’ a kung-fu master and a notorious cowboy, who loves to drink but must dash his way through the treacherous desert and fight against foes in order to get to the saloon on the other side.

  • Jump off walls and dash your way through challenging platforms 
  • Headshot enemies for precision kill and dodge attacks by dashing
  • Gain 'qi' as you progress and upgrade to stronger weapons and buffs
  • Procedurally-generated platforms and permadeath challenge you to get better
  • Recommended for advanced players or for those who love a challenge

This is an alpha demo and is not necessarily representative in any way of the final game. We are testing out if players enjoy the dashing mechanic and overall gameplay. We plan to add additional assets to the game including more levels, upgrades, boss fights, etc. We would love to hear your feedback so feel free to share with us in the comments or our Twitter @soyboygames

Kungfu Cowboy is in development by Soyboy Games
Made with Unity
Art by Jacky Huang
Music by Daniel Bernal

Controls:
W,A,S,D to move
Use mouse to aim gun and angle jumps/dashes
Tap Space to short hop/Hold Space to long jump
Tap Shift to short dash/Hold Shift to long dash

Note: We recommend that you start off with the tutorial before proceeding to play the game
